snippet: To the Editor:    Re ''Shift in the Mix Alters Face of California'' (front page, July 4):    You report that demographers predict that non-Hispanic whites will soon lose majority status in California....
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''Shift in the Mix Alters Face of California'' (front page, July 4): You report that demographers predict that non-Hispanic whites will soon lose majority status in California.
abstract: James Melchiorre letter responds to July 4 front-page article on forecast that non-Hispanic whites will soon lose majority status in California; recalls California was part of Mexico and very Spanish a very short 150 years ago (M)
